definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: This machine is called rings-type tackle.
sentences.chinese: 这种机器叫吊环型滑车。

sentences.english: Alternatively, pulleys can also be used.
sentences.chinese: 二者择一地，滑车也能被用。

sentences.english: Fasten the pulley and the support block to your worktable.
sentences.chinese: 拴紧对你的工作台的滑车和支承区块。

sentences.english: We want to use this pulley.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要使用这个滑车。

sentences.english: The individual strands of each cable were hung in pulley blocks.
sentences.chinese: 每根钢索的单股钢丝束悬挂在滑车组上。

sentences.english: Damage to the trochlea could occur, as the periosteum is elevated from bone or during healing.
sentences.chinese: 当骨膜抬高或愈合过程中，滑车可能受到损伤。

sentences.english: I'll get the Bosun to change the blocks for new ones.
sentences.chinese: 我将让水手长把滑车换成新的。

sentences.english: To replace the drilling line wrapped around the crown block and traveling block.
sentences.chinese: 为更换缠绕在天车和游动滑车周围的钻井钢丝绳用。

sentences.english: The subjects of femoral trochlear dysplasia and medial subluxation of the patella are briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 受试者股骨滑车发育不良和内侧脱位髌骨简要讨论。

sentences.english: No instances of patellar or trochlear loosening were identified.
sentences.chinese: 没有确定的髌骨或滑车松动的实例。

sentences.english: Sometimes can hear clear and crisply play sound when the pulley returns to joint nest.
sentences.chinese: 有时在滑车回关节窝时能听到清脆的弹响声。

sentences.english: The companion blocks to these pulleys are the traveling blocks.
sentences.chinese: 与这些滑轮组相连接的滑车称为游动滑车。

sentences.english: The companion blocks to these pulleys are the traveling blocks.
sentences.chinese: 与这些滑轮组相连接的滑车称为游动滑车。

sentences.english: They represent shear-type injuries involving the capitellum, trochlea, or both.
sentences.chinese: 剪力型损伤可累及肱骨小头，滑车或二者均有损伤。

definition: rope tackle hanging from a mast/crow foot (system of ropes through tackle to hold up an awning)
